pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d) 2 Dark Leaf, 1 Sproutling, 1 Bark Enforced Sproutling, 1 Empty Premium Packet, 200 Sun value.

pages.title: 🗡 Bruisers
pages.text: $(#25228d)Bashes zombies from below; Creates withering flowers on killing a zombie.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Zombies that dies to it drop a Withered Marigold Pile.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)Doom Rose really likes Doom, though doesn't have hands to rip and tear with so punching with rose buds will have to do.

pages.title: References
text: $(br2)$(#bd951a)Plants vs. Zombies: Battle For Neighborville: $()$(#ff0000)Doom Rose
